casebody.data:
No. 09-11439 (09A1229). Ronnie Lee Gardner, Petitioner v. Curtis Garner, Chairman, Utah Board of Pardons and Parole, et al. 560 U.S. 981, 130 S. Ct. 3450,

177 L. Ed. 2d 354,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 4976. June 17, 2010.

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death, presented to Justice Sotomayor, and by her referred to the Court, denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.
